Tolkien-related events that took place in 2012.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - Birthday Toast.
19 - Do Balrogs Have Wings? by Andrew Rilstone is published.
? - Amon Hen 233 is published.

content.title: February
content.content: 25 - Tolkien and Wagner: The Ring and Der Ring is published.

content.title: March
content.content:
8 - Author Robert Giddings dies.
12 - Update 6: Shores of the Great River, the sixth free update of The Lord of the Rings Online, is released.
20 - Makers Of The Middle Ages by Richard Utz and Elizabeth Emery is published.
25 - Tolkien Reading Day.
25 - Pipe Smoking In Middle Earth by Mark Irwin is published.
29 - Author Jan Broberg dies.
? - Amon Hen 234 is published.
? - Mallorn 53 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
19 - Tolkien in East Yorkshire 1917 - 1918 by Phil Mathison is published.
27 - 29 - Deutsche Tolkien Gesellschaft 9th Seminar.

content.title: May
content.content:
4 - JRR Tolkien: The True Lord of the Rings, a graphic novel, is published.
19 - 20 - Middle-earth Weekend at Sarehole Mill, Birmingham.
? - Amon Hen 235 is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
2 - 3 - Unquendor and Deutsche Tolkien Gesellschaft's International Tolkien Day.
7 - Pocket Posh J.R.R. Tolkien by The Puzzle Society is published.
9 - The Broken Scythe: Death and Immortality in the Works of J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
17 - The Hobbit Novel Guide by Shan C. Gillard is published.
20 - Wagner and Tolkien: Mythmakers is published.
24 - Actor James Grout dies.
26 - Tolkien and Welsh by Mark T. Hooker is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
6 - Principal photography of The Hobbit films ends.
12 - 15 - Tolkien Thing 2012.
15 - The International Relations of Middle-Earth by Abigail E. Ruane and Patrick James is published.
26 - The Saga of Hrolf Kraki, translated by Stella M. Mills, is published in a new edition, with a Foreword by Priscilla Tolkien.
? - Amon Hen 236 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
3 - Parma Eldalamberon 20: The Qenya Alphabet by J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
3 - 6 - Mythcon 43 at University of California, Berkeley.
11 - Hobbit to Hero by Elizabeth M. Stephen is published.
16 - 20 - The Return of the Ring, Tolkien Society conference at Loughborough University.
30 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey: Annual 2013 is published.
30 - Tolkien Calendar 2013 is published.
? - Tolkien Studies: Volume 9 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
1 - There and Back Again: J. R. R. Tolkien and the Origins of the Hobbit by Mark Atherton is published.
5 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Riders of Rohan is released.
12 - An updated edition of Charles Dixon and David T. Wenzel's The Hobbit is published.
13 - Hobbitus Ille, the Latin translation of The Hobbit, is published.
14 - An article about J.R.R. Tolkien and the artist Mary Fairburn is published in Times Literary Supplement.
21 - 23 - Oxonmoot 2012 at Lady Margaret Hall.
22 - Exploring J.R.R. Tolkien's The Hobbit by Corey Olsen is published.
26 - Tolkien's World: A Guide to the Peoples and Places of Middle-Earth by Changed Gareth Hanrahan and Peter McKinstry is published.
27 - A revised edition of Letters from Father Christmas is published.
? - Amon Hen 237 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
1 - A Hobbit Journey: Discovering the Enchantment of J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-Earth by Matthew Dickerson is published.
1 - On the Shoulders of Hobbits: The Road to Virtue with Tolkien and Lewis by Louis Markos is published.
3 - The Hobbit and Philosophy by Gregory Bassham and Eric Bronson is published.
18 - A Brief Guide to J. R. R. Tolkien by Nigel Cawthorne is published.
25 - What Would Bilbo Do? The Unofficial Hobbit Handbook is published.
30 - J.R.R. Tolkien: The Making of a Legend by Colin Duriez is published.
? - The Christian World of the Hobbit is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
1 - The J.R.R. Tolkien Miscellany by Robert S. Blackham is published.
6 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey: The Movie Storybook by Paddy Kempshall is published.
6 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey: Official Movie Guide by Brian Sibley is published.
6 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey: Visual Companion by Jude Fisher is published.
6 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey: The World of Hobbits by Paddy Kempshall is published.
8 - The Hobbit: Kingdoms of Middle-earth is released online.
13 - The Tolkien Years of the Brothers Hildebrandt is published.
17 - 18 - Deutsche Tolkien Gesellschaft's The Hobbit Party.
19 - The Tolkien Estate, The Tolkien Trust and HarperCollins file another lawsuit with New Line Cinema and the Saul Zaentz Company over merchandising rights.
27 - The Hobbits: The Many Lives of Bilbo, Frodo, Sam, Merry and Pippin is published.
30 - Amazing & Extraordinary Facts: J R R Tolkien by Colin Duriez is published.
? - Amon Hen 238 is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
4 - Guardians of Middle-earth is released on PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
11 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack is released
12 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey is released in New Zealand.
13 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey is released in Europe.
14 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey is released in India and North America.
14 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey: Chronicles: Art & Design is published.
20 - Shamanic Odyssey: Homer, Tolkien, and the Visionary Experience by Robert Tindall and Susana Bustos is published.
26 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey is released in Australia.
? - The Hobbit Strategy Battle Game is released.

content.title: Unknown
content.content:
? - John Garth became aware that Christopher Tolkien "was considering editing The Bovadium Fragments for publication".[1]
